pullRequest.body:
We get better simp normal forms not by unfolding `transport` but instead putting `simps!` at the definition that uses `transport`. The compiling time is also improved.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

### PR summary [8ee9911b07](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16819/commits/8ee9911b078f6dc6f28af2ad3205057c9c86d1fe)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ monoidal`
`+ tensorUnit_ρ`
`+ tensorUnit_ρ'`
`+ tensor_ρ`
`+ tensor_ρ'`
`- associator_hom_hom`
`- associator_inv_hom`
`- char_tensor'`
`- instance [BraidedCategory C] : MonoidalCategory (Comon_ C)`
`- leftUnitor_hom_hom`
`- leftUnitor_inv_hom`
`- rightUnitor_hom_hom`
`- rightUnitor_inv_hom`
`- tensorUnit_rho`
`- tensorUnit_v`
`- tensor_hom`
`- tensor_rho`
`- tensor_v`
`- whiskerLeft_hom`
`- whiskerRight_hom`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/81acc8bf-08cf-4ae1-93e2-7412eeffc5de) for commit 669307b9a1e7be5a443d4aaf93e8135597c1f247.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/b3c3417b-ea89-43ba-b125-4496f190a8e6/to/81acc8bf-08cf-4ae1-93e2-7412eeffc5de) against commit 036e95660db26bb62facb62d0e4279aaa594200d:
```diff
  Benchmark                                       Metric         Change
  =====================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Bimon_         instructions   -16.9%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Comon_         instructions   -11.5%
+ ~Mathlib.RepresentationTheory.Action.Monoidal   instructions   -30.0%
```

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/892c3213-9e4c-4981-a5f7-7ececfd3ad96) for commit ca9a71f20fc90ce4eabe2252c8cce4aface32a2e.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/2ef2278d-fa36-4d08-8833-f914782dacfb/to/892c3213-9e4c-4981-a5f7-7ececfd3ad96) against commit 80f223fc82f8d29881a5c1098b0431d6a0a25870:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                   Metric         Change
  =================================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Bimon_                     instructions   -58.1%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Comon_                     instructions   -49.3%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Internal.FunctorCategory   instructions   -13.8%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.Subcategory                instructions   -35.0%
+ ~Mathlib.RepresentationTheory.Action.Monoidal               instructions   -74.8%
```

:v: yuma-mizuno can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10884060749/job/30198531496)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10884060749/job/30198530740)

It seems that the standard way to do this in mathlib is:
```suggestion
@[simps (config := .lemmasOnly)]
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor(Mathlib/CategoryTheory/Monoidal/Transport): remove `simps` at `transport`
